notenoughcreativity.title: Creative+ 物品欄
notenoughcreativity.swap: 切換到 Creative+ 物品欄
notenoughcreativity.exit: 切換到創造模式物品欄
notenoughcreativity.ability.nopickup.des: 完全防止撿起物品，避免物品欄雜亂。
notenoughcreativity.ability.attack.name: 立即擊殺
notenoughcreativity.ability.attack.desc: 增加你的衝擊傷害以擺脫討厭的生物，而不需要携帶劍。同時避免殺死生物所掉下的戰利品。
notenoughcreativity.ability.health.name: 允許被傷害
notenoughcreativity.ability.health.desc: 允許您被傷害並且顯示您的血量條。除非傷害者可以殺死創造模式的玩家，否則您依然無法死亡。
notenoughcreativity.ability.instabreak.d: 停用創造模式破壞的延遲，讓您挖掘所有方塊都可以像金鎬破壞地獄石一樣快速。
notenoughcreativity.ability.pickswap.des: Move unique items into the upper inventory instead of deleting them when pickblocking with a held item. Also remove the first matching item from the upper inventory when pickblocking.
令所有方塊都有滿的亮度，卻沒有夜視效果。
notenoughcreativity.ability.noclip.name: 穿墻
notenoughcreativity.ability.noclip.desc: 像旁觀者模式一樣停用碰撞。
